short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple chrome extension that notifies you anytime when there's new episode of your favourite shows.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:
1) Autocomplete Search of your favourite tv shows.
2) Seamlesly add your tv shows to your list.
3) Next episode date is automatically updated.
4) Ability to delete already added tv show from list.

This extension uses www.tvmaze.com to get episode dates.
